# General bank details

## What is the name of the bank?

*e.g. `Revolut`*

## Is this bank also known under a different name? If so, please add the aliases here

*e.g. `VR` for Volksbank-Raiffeisenbank*

## In which countries does the bank operate (only for private customers, not for commercial customers). Please add them as a comma separated 2-digit country code list.

*e.g. `DE,FR`*

## What is the logo for the bank. If possible, use a square logo. Have a look at [Brandfetch](https://brandfetch.com) for logos.

*paste image here*

## What is the website for the bank? If the bank operates in multiple countries, try to use one with a `.com` domain. If that is not possible, try to use the domain from the country, where the bank mostly operates in.

*e.g. `https://mybank.com`*

## What is the BIC of the bank?

*e.g. `NTSBDEB1XXX`*
